https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mRr8QTzkXMFLbE0cTBrTh0EO33a.jpg A man coping with the institutionalization of his wife because of Alzheimer's disease faces an epiphany when she transfers her affections to another man, a wheel chair-bound mute who also is a patient at the nursing home. Away from Her
